column4: hello, I have a problem with my thinkpad x61 tablet after I upgraded from hardy to intrepid. My wireless doesn't work anymore. There is no icon or anything. Does anyone know anything I can try?
try this: press Alt+F2 and run NetworkManager and see if any icon appears
thank you, I tried it but no icon appeared. Nothing changed. :S
I don't know how to fix it either then, sorry
